definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

sentences.english: Study on nuclease activity with fluorescence quenching probe.
sentences.chinese: 用熒光淬火雙鏈探針研究核酸酶的活性。

sentences.english: The lengths of the double stranded cDNA fragments were about 500 base pairs.
sentences.chinese: 其雙鏈鏈長，經凝膠電泳分析，約爲500鹼基對。

sentences.english: Some relationships between Markov chains in random environments and jointly Markov chains are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了馬氏雙鏈與隨機環境中馬氏鏈的關係。

sentences.english: Putting forward a Double linked List with two sides arithmetic for segmenting images .
sentences.chinese: 提出一種雙側雙鏈表分割算法對圖像進行分割。

sentences.english: Here, the broken, double-stranded ends are stitched back together without regard to the original sequence.
sentences.chinese: 這是斷裂的雙鏈終端被縫合而不遵守其原來的序列。

sentences.english: The base line can be set out as a single or double chain.
sentences.chinese: 基線可作爲一條單鏈系或雙鏈系。

sentences.english: In most organisms, the DNA is an extended double-stranded polymer.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數生物，DNA被延長雙鏈的聚合物。
